Verses: 1 sidhekkiyaa Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththoru Vayadhaayirundhaan; Avan Padhinoru Varusham Erusalemil Raajyabaarampanninaan; Avanudaiya Thaayin Per Amuththaal, Aval Lipnaa Ooraanaagiya Eremiyaavin Kumaaraththi.
2 yoyaakkeem Seydhapadiyellaam Avanum Karththarudaiya Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.

3 erusalemaiyum Yoodhaavaiyum Karththar Thammudaiya Samugaththaivittu Agatrith Theerumalavum, Avaigalin Melulla Avarudaiya Kobaththinaal Ippadi Nadandhadhum Allaamal, Sidhekkiyaa Baabilonile Raajaavukku Virodhamaagak Kalagampanninaan.

4 avan Raajyabaarampannum Onbadhaam Varusham Paththaam Maadham Paththaanthedhiyile Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarum, Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvamum Erusalemukku Virodhamaai Vandhu, Adharku Edhiraagap Paalayamirangi, Sutrilum Adharku Edhiraagak Koththalangalaik Kattinaargal.
5 appadiye Sidhekkiyaa Raajaavin Padhinoraam Varushamattum Nagaram Mutrikkai Podappattirundhadhu.
6 naalaam Maadham Onbadhaam Thedhiyile Panjam Nagaraththile Adhigariththu, Dhesaththin Janaththukku Aagaaramillaamal Poyitru.

7 nagaraththin Madhil Idikkappattadhu; Appozhudhu Kaldheyar Nagaraththai Soozhndhirukkaiyil, Yuththamanushar Ellaarum Raaththirikaalaththil Odi, Raajaavudaiya Thottaththin Vazhiye Irandu Madhilgalukkum Naduvaana Vaasalaal Nagaraththilirundhu Purappattu, Vayalveliyin Vazhiye Poivittaargal.

8 aanaalum Kaldheyarudaiya Raanuvaththaar Raajaavaip Pinthodarndhu, Erigovin Samanaana Boomiyil Sidhekkiyaavaik Kittinaargal; Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Raanuvaththaar Ellaarum Avanaivittu Sidharipponaargal.
9 avargal Raajaavaip Pidiththu, Avanai Aamaaththesaththin Ooraagiya Riplaavukku Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaaridaththukkuk Konduponaargal; Ange Ivanukku Nyaayaththeerppuk Koduththaan.
10 pinbu Baabilon Raajaa Sidhekkiyaavin Kumaararai Avan Kangalukku Munbaaga Vettinaan; Yoodhaavin Prabukkalellaaraiyum Riplaavile Vettinaan.

11 sidhekkiyaavin Kangalaik Kurudaakki, Avanukku Irandu Vilangugalaip Poduviththaan; Pinbu Baabilon Raajaa Avanai Baabilonukkuk Kondupoi, Avan Maranamadaiyum Naalmattum Avanaik Kaaval Veettil Adaiththuvaiththaan.

12 aindhaam Maadham Paththaanthedhiyile, Baabilon Raajaavukku Munbaaga Nirkiravanaagiya Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaana Nebusaraadhaan Erusalemukku Vandhaan; Adhu Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Raajaa Baabilonai Arasaalugira Paththonbadhaam Varushamaayirundhadhu.
13 avan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaiyum, Raajaavin Aramanaiyaiyum, Erusalemilulla Ellaa Veedugalaiyum, Ovvoru Periya Manidhanudaiya Veettaiyum Akkiniyinaal Sutteriththuppottaan.
14 kaavarchenaadhipadhiyodirundha Kaldheyarin Raanuvaththaarellaarum Erusalemai Sutrilum Irundha Alangangalai Idiththuppottaargal.

15 janaththil Ezhaigalaana Silaraiyum Nagaraththil Meedhiyaana Matra Janaththaiyum, Baabilon Raajaavin Vasamaaga Odivandhuvittavargalaiyum, Matra Janangalaiyum Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Siraigalaagak Konduponaan.
16 aanaal Dhesaththaaril Ezhaigalaana Silaraik Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Dhraatchaththottakkaararaagavum Payiridunkudigalaagavum Vittuvaiththaan.

17 karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundhu Vengalath Thoongalaiyum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundha Aadhaarangalaiyum, Vengalak Kadalthottiyaiyum Kaldheyar Udaiththuppottu, Avaigalin Vengalaththaiyellaam Baabilonukku Eduththukkondu Ponaargal.
18 seppuchchattigalaiyum, Saambal Edukkum Karandigalaiyum, Vettukkaththigalaiyum, Kalangalaiyum, Kalayangalaiyum, Aaraadhanaikkuriya Sagala Vengalappanimuttugalaiyum Eduththukkonduponaargal.
19 pasumponnum Suththavelliyumaana Kinnangalaiyum Thoobakalasangalaiyum, Kalangalaiyum, Sattigalaiyum, Vilakkuththandugalaiyum, Kalayangalaiyum, Karagangalaiyum Kaavarchenaadhipadhi Eduththukkondaan.

20 saalomon Raajaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkaaga Seydhu Vaiththa Irandu Thoongalum Oru Kadal Thottiyum Aadhaarangalin Keezhnindra Pannirandu Vengala Rishabangalum Aagiya Ivaigalukkuriya Vengalaththukku Niraiyillai.
21 andhath Thoongalovenil, Ovvoru Thoonum Padhinettumuzha Uyaramaayirundhadhu; Pannirandu Muzhanool Adhai Sutrum; Naalu Virarkadai Adhin Ganam; Ulle Kuzhaayaayirundhadhu.

22 adhinmel Vengalak Kumizh Irundhadhu; Oru Kumizhin Uyaram Aindhu Muzham, Kumizhile Sutrilum Pinnalum Maadhalampazhangalum Seydhirundhadhu; Ellaam Vengalamaayirundhadhu; Adharku Sariyaai Matrath Thoonukkum Maadhalampazhangalum Seydhirundhadhu.
23 thonnootraaru Maadhalampazhangal Naangu Thisaigalukkum Edhiraaga Seydhirundhadhu; Kumizhai Sutrilum Seydhirundha Maadhalampazhangal Nooru.
24 kaavarchenaadhipadhi Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Seraayaavaiyum, Irandaam Aasaariyanaagiya Seppaniyaavaiyum, Vaasarpadiyin Moondru Kaavarkaararaiyum Pidiththukkonduponaan.

25 nagaraththilovendraal Avan Yuththa Manusharin Visaarippukkaaranaagiya Pradhaani Oruvanaiyum, Raajaavin Mandhirigalil Nagaraththil Adappatta Ezhu Peraiyum, Dhesaththin Janaththai Sevagam Ezhudhugira Thalaimaiyaana Sambiradhiyaiyum, Dhesaththu Janaththile Pattanaththin Naduvil Adappatta Arubadhu Peraiyum Pidiththukkonduponaan.
26 avargalaik Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Pidiththu, Avargalai Riplaavukku Baabilon Raajaavinidaththirkuk Kondupoi Vittaan.
27 appozhudhu Baabilon Raajaa Aamaadh Ennum Dhesaththin Pattanamaagiya Riplaavile Avargalai Vettikkondrupottaan; Ivvidhamaaga Yoodhargal Thangal Dhesaththilirundhu Siraigalaaik Kondupogappattaargal.
28 nebugaadhnechchaar Siraipidiththuppona Janangalin Thogai Evvalavendraal, Ezhaam Varushaththil Moovaayiraththu Irubaththumoondru Yoodharum,
29 nebugaadhnechchaarudaiya Padhinettaam Varushaththil Erusalemilirundhu Ennootru Muppaththirandu Pergalum Kondupogappattaargal.

30 nebugaadhnechchaarudaiya Irubaththumoondraam Varushaththil Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Yoodharil Ezhunootru Naarpaththaindhupergalai Siraipidiththukkonduponaan; Aaga Naalaayiraththu Arunoorupergalaam.

31 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeenudaiya Siraiyiruppin Muppaththezhaam Varusham Pannirandaam Maadham Irubaththaindhaam Thedhiyile, Evil Merodhaak Ennum Baabilon Raajaa, Thaan Raajaavaana Varushaththile, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeenai Siraichchaalaiyilirundhu Velippadappanni, Avan Thalaiyai Uyarththi,
32 avanode Anbaaip Pesi, Avanudaiya Aasanaththaith Thannode Baabilonil Irundha Raajaakkaludaiya Aasanangalukku Melaaga Vaiththu,
33 avanudaiya Siraiyiruppu Vasthirangalai Maatrinaan; Avan Uyirodirundha Sagala Naalum Than Samugaththil Niththam Pojanampannumpadi Seydhaan.

34 avan Uyirodirundha Naalellaam Avanudaiya Marananaal Pariyandhamum, Avanudaiya Selavukkaaga Baabilon Raajaavinaal Kattalaiyaana Anudhinath Thittaththinpadi, Anudhinamum Avanukkuk Kodukkappattuvandhadhu.
